price: [Y se les dirá entonces:] De nada sirve que pidan auxilio hoy, pues nadie podrá salvarlos de Mi castigo.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
